name: 2XL ATV Offroad Quad Racing 3D
description:
Welcome to Endless ATV Quad Bike Racing Game, Enjoy and have fun Driving QUAD BIKE
This awesome ATV game have one of the best driving experience of the Marketplace. Just sit back and relax having some extreme fun on this endless quad racing game. Ride the highway and dodge the traffic! Switch the controls by choosing Buttons or Gyroscope on the settings menu. Don't let the ATV quad bike be destroyed. Collect as much coins as you can to get more Quads in QUAD RACER
Play this amazing ATV Racing adventure,ATV RACER, select the driving Moto that you like and have real cool driving experience in Desert, City, Beach and Snow Scenarios with QUAD BIKE! Turn left to right trough the road and void the traffic cars and bus drivers while driving ATV BIKE in this QUAD RACER.
Hit the nitro turbo button to speed up ATV BIKE and go the faster as you can to beat other players distance at leader boards Rankings. You cant go off road, only drive through the Highway.
This ATV Moto Driving games is full of adrenaline! Hit the turbo to speed up, try not to burn out the quad! We Hope you get so excited with this racing game and please give us your opinion! We care about your thoughts.
Drive the ATV Bike and avoid traffic vehicles while increasing speed to the limits. Enjoy this Extreme motorcycle quads on a dusty trail racing through desert, beach, mountain and snow. Try to get as far as possible with nitro and beat your Friends at the Leaderboards.
Control your ATV bikes with an incredible fast turbo speed during the extreme traffic rush time! Get more money to buy new and improved Atv Quads.
Easy Controls and Incredible 3d HD graphics games. Test our Atv Traffic racing game and enjoy it.

- Unlock new scenarios
- Switch Tilt or Touch to steer
- Theme ATV Racing games
- Different quad to choose
- Stunning 3D graphics
